text: nidahas sithuwili: 346.
mage putha udayayi, mage duwa buhutiyi.

“ hamadema nathuwath aramunu nathiwa oohe gewena jiwitha athare hamadema thibiyadith aramunak wenuwen, ee aramuna soya yanna ohu gath wehesa, muhuna dun abhiyoga ada ohuta hari sundara sathuta danawana athdakim wi athi nisawen thawa thawath ee gana ahanna mama uthsuka wuna.
athiwishala paratharayak wasa damamin owunta langawanna apata siduwela thibenne. ...”
nila sancharayak sandaha aaradhanayak kirima thulin eksath rajadhaniye maha rajina dushkarathawakata pathwiya haki bawada ema pethsame sandahan weyi.
"me siyayata 18 watup kappaduwa (api) bhara ganne naha.
inpasuwa apata danagatha haki wanne parani udarata nilame keneku wana basnayaka nilame saha dewalaye lekamwarayayi.
apita mathakayi pasugiya wathawe shri lanka nidahas pakshaye mayi raliya pawathwuneth galledi kiyala.
walawa nimnayata ayath udawalawa jathika udyanaye walasun ha diwiyan daka ganima wirala ya.
rahathan wahanse dewana pathis nirindunge aaradhanayen ethuma wisin karawa puja karana lada ata sata lenwala was elambaiyaha.
dan me kathawa ahan hitapu pembaraya ahuwa…
ahasa simbainna tharam udakata nowihidunath ee pokunen ihala nagina wathura mala hungak lassanayi.

mohu mese tharunayan pirisakata kanthawan lingika wahalun lesa thabagatha haki yayi pawasana ayuru rahasiwa patigatha kara athira mohuta wiruddhawa parikshana aarambha wi athi bawa wides madhya wartha karanawa.
mage urahise asthiyata wunu haniya nisa urahisata bandej ekak dala masa ekahamarakma thibuna.

walikanda karapola gammanaye warshawath samaga eeye (26) sawasa hama giya dadi sulangakin niwasa 15kata hani sidu wi thibenawa.walikanda pradeshiya lekam harsha bandara prakasha kale mema sulanga hethuwen wahalawal galawi gos niwasa 3kata purna hani sidu wi athi bawayi.niwasa 12kata ardha hani siduwimen pudgalayin 52k awathanwa sitina bawayi wartha wanne.sulan thathwaya winadi dahayaka pamana kalayak pawathi athara ee hethuwen gammanaye widuli rahan mathata gas kadawatimen niwasa kihipayakata widuliyada wisandhi wi thibenawa.akunu sara wadimen niwasa kihipayaka gruha widuli upakarana rasakatada hani sidu wuna.apa kala wimasimakadi karapola gramaniladhari ke. dab. ji. en. gunarathna sandahan kale awathanwuwanta pisu aahara laba di owun gnyathi niwes wala randawimata katayuthu kara athi bawayi.
palliwala bharakarathwaya himi wanne ema parajakawadeshaye muslim dayaka sabhawata ya.
habayi ehema ekak wyawasthawe thibbe naha.
dan nirupanaya kerenne bihisunu yuda gatumya.

dewani wara kiyawimen pasu, panath ketumpatha (eya wisarjana panath ketumpathak nowanne nam) purna parlimenthu karaka sabhawak wethada, ese nomathi nam 52 sthawara niyogaye prakarawa amathyawarayakuge ho niyojya amathyawarayakuge illima matha wishesha karaka sabhawak ho sthawara karaka sabhawak wetha yomu karanu labe.

kese wethath obe lagnaye lagnaya, lagnadhipathi, chandraya ha rawi yana grahayan hathara denagen thun denakuwath dubala wi owun papi grahayanta madiwi ashubha grahayan sitimakata ho dakimakata lakwe nam obe kendaraye hadisi anathuru yogayak athi bawa watahaganna.
ohuta dolar biliyana 4 ka aadhara mudalak laba ganimata eksath janapada sancharayedi hakiwuna.

demala basawa kathakaranna hakiyawa nuwaraeliya badulla diha demala aya ekka mishra wela inna sinhala daruwanta ibema enawa..ee pathiwala demala aya sinhalath sinhalaa ya demalath katha karanawa bohoma lesiyen..

yuddhaya dinawimata itha mahagu sewayak kala luthinan janaral sarath fonseka mahatha da apa mehidi amathaka nokala yuthuya.namuth mage mathaya meseyi.ohu itha shreshta wirayeki.namuth ohu balayata kadara wiya.ohu chanda laba ganima sandaha lankawe wira sebalun pawa duni.me siyalu de aarambha wanne ohuge sudu kodi kathaweni.
emenma awantgang wani siduwim mangin da nirupanaya wanne kata wahare parabhauthika swabhawayayi.
naththan wadak wena ekak na.
shishya sangamwalin bala karala thamayi oya shishyayo pelapaliwalata genayanne.
ape podi ewunuth dan kukul mas nathiwa bath kanne nathi thathwekata pathwela.
mi pani wunath hamadama kanakota thiththa wenawa kiyala kathawak thiyenawane . .
namuth eewa boruyi kiyala sakshi sadhaka sahithawa oppu kirima lehesi na.
mata oyage hithe thiyana de penawa.

ketiyen kiyannam.me kramaya hadunwanne "adu parathara wagawa" kiyala api kalin kesel wagawa kale samanyyayen adi10*10 paratharetane.ethakota pala 400 withara thamayi akkarekata watenne.anith eka ee widiyata wagawak wadi kalayak nadaththu karanna api balaporoththu unath dan thiyena ledawal ekka ehema karaganna labenne na goda denekta.anika panama kiyana rogi thathwayath ekka wisheshayen puwalu nam hadannama ba.anith eka anthima wenakan kehel gahata saththu karala,wathura gahala pidenna onnamamenna thiya thamayi me leda enne.awasanaye laksha ganak wathure.
hariyata oya ranil hora neweyi kiwwama eka wiswasa karana ayawage!

ginimalaya niwi yamata aasanna nisa eyata dara kotayak damiya yuthuya.

"mama oya wage loku, hayi haththiya thiyena pirimiyek langa wadiwela yanna labima gana dewiyanta sthuthi karanawa.
meka ahapu ape ana (owu, owu, ara ibola anama thama) krishata abhiyogayak idiripath kala.

“aැyi yako mehema karanne….
apage ithihasa kathawata anuwa wijaya kumaruta mulinma hamuwanne da ballaki.
lankawe chithra shilpiyaku wisin jathyantharawa laba ganna lada ihalama sammanayak washayenda eya adatath agayimata lak weyi.
mama harin prananduge daruwanwa ohu pasalata ewana thek bala sitimi.
kara kiya gatha nohaki wa malli kediri gawa ya.
pasugiya kalaye ape rate atham deshapalakayinge daruwan hasirena aakaraya desa balana wita ee bawa pilibimbau we.

ee anuwa kshaya rogaya lowen thuran kirima ketharam asiru katayuththakdayi obata watahenu atha.

kolambaa kotuwa mahesthrath lanka jayarathna menawiya danum dunne, arjuna mahendran mahatha shri lankawata pituwahal kara ganima sandaha gena athi nithimaya piyawara pilibandawa ehidi danum dena lesa ya.

anna ee thapasathumawa muna gahila thamun rajakamata sudusuyi kiyala liyumak aragen enna.

emenma sapthambar 11 praharayata boho ihathadi rajaya perala damimata kumanthranayakda diyath diyath karana ladde nawa rajaya opek mila wadi kirime giwisum winasha kirima sandaha iraka thel prayojanayata ganu athayi da opek hi simawan ikmawa thel nishpadanaya karanu athayida apekshaweni mema salasum aakramanayedi sidu wi sulu kalekin ath hara damuni.

in pradhana thana ganne pudgalika libaral hinayak pasupasa yamin thrasthawadin sanasawana eeniya sama kriya damayak haraha rate aarakshawath, swadinathwayath pamanak nowa aathma garuthwaya pawa ugas thabimata karana lada wada kotasaya.

pasuwa merata osteraliyanu mahakomasaris karyalaye madihathwima matha gunarathnam mahatha athadanguwen mudahara shri lankawen pituwahal karana ladi.
amathaka wenawa thawapodden botath suba nawa wasarak wewa..!
kello kiyawannama aththe ooka ban...
enam kruthiyak desa wiwidha drushtingen dakima.
mokakda ban puluwan...
apata hoda parichayak athnam me wade amaru naha.
ma peradeniye gatha kala siw wasaraka kalaya thula liyu kawi, ee kalaye di ma hanthane kandu pamula saha mayawo namin poth ath pitapath dekakata gonu kalemi.

ee praharaya sidukaranna pamini ayage nam pawa polisiyata laba di thibenawa.
me gatum nirmanaya kala piris bauddha bhikshunwahansela sathu balaya, watinakam paddhathiya halluwata lak kirimata da uthsaha karamin sitinawa.
obe sahakaru ho sahakariya nomathi nam sahakaruwek soya ganna.
mama me kiyanne obata pamanak noweyi, aanduwe kambaa gilina hamotama.

dutugamunutath mata mathaka widihata yudden passe mahinda sindrom eka haduna.yuddheta dayaka wechcha niladharin yata gihilla dutugamunu witharak mathu una.yodhayo dethun denekma kalakirila wen una wage deyak kohe hari kiyewwa.
” mama dannawa meka mage hathurange wadak kiyala…..
budu hamuduruwo kiyala thiyenne hathurantath maithri karanna kiyala nemeyida?
ema jawanikawa rugatha karanu pinisa ekawara kamara 15 kata wadi pramanayak bhawitha kara athayi antharjalaye sandahan weyi.
ee wagema mama balaporoththu wena nithi rithi kriyathmaka karannath mata eeka wasiyak wenawa.
ema pa්raharayen aabadhitha wu gabini mawwarun, tharuniyan ha kanthawan athulu windithayanta sidu wuye kumak dayi sadharana parikshana hawul aanduwen ho natha.
habayi prasiddha kalakaruwek wela thibuneth naha.
ee wagemayi muslim nowana ayagen aya kerunu jesiya badda iwath karannath me awasthawe adhirajaya polambaawa ganna guru amardas samath wenawa.
mokada mehema deyak katawath wenna epa kiyalayi mama nam hithanne..
"balanna magenuth kapanawa ne wandambau aramudalata salli mas patha,....
“ dina gananawak horagal ahilimen pasuwa chaminda wisin sumanasiri mahaththayagen nayak illana ladi.
samahara aya meka balala ehema kiwwa..
nawika hamuda barayata gath pudgalayin yapanaya gurunagar pradeshaye padinchikaruwan.
monawa unath budun deshana kala dharmaya pilipadina aya nam bohoma adu bawa thamayi penenne.
mokada duriyan kanakota mamath ayiya kiyapu oya aathmarthakami wade ee widihatama karana hinda.....hiks....
namuth oba thula me jiwithakalaya purawatama danuna yam asampurna kamak gana oba mata kiyu dinaya mathak karaganna..
obage pudgalika daththa swalpayak labadima magin obata adala jana wyapthiya antharjalaye mrudukangayak haraha danaganimata ada hakiyawa thibe.
owuhu anyagam yana wadana pawichchi karathi.
wata diwena diya agala balakotuwa wata diwena diya agalata sambandha wana athara doratuwa abhyantharaye da diya agal dekakin samanwitha we.
wipakshaye parlimenthu mantha්rin panas ek denekuta ayithiwasikam ahimi wela thiyenawa.
kilinochchiyata yanna kalin hitiye rathnapure krayim eke.
mita masa kihipayakata pera da ohu amerikawe sancharaya kala namuth ohuta erehiwa kisidu chodanawak ella wi nomatha.
